ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Not Sure' ),$Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ , ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Junk- NC') , ISPICKVAL(RW_Reason_for_Unqualified__c, "") , $Profile.Name = 'Pre Sales Executive' )
